unnormalised: Arre yaar, Labour Law Sec 17B aataam moddun kaadlaa na? Aikolaam tem 30/06/2024 upraant workmen compacher porinnam korta mhunn.
normalised: Arre yaar, Labour Law Section satra B halinch sudharlo na? Aikla·πÅ ki tis June don hazar chovisachea uprant workmen compacher porinnam zata mhunn.
text: Arre yaar, Labour Law Sec 17B aataam moddun kaadlaa na? Aikolaam tem 30/06/2024 upraant workmen compacher porinnam korta mhunn.
